parts.text: You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are the admission requirements for a bachelor's degree at LIU?

To apply to LIU as a bachelor student, you will need to prepare the following documents: Certified copy of the Lebanese Baccalaureate Degree (BACCII) or Technical Baccalaureate degree (BT3) or their equivalence (Foreign Baccalaureate), TOEFL (International IBT) or IELTS score (if available, or must sit for the LIU English Placement Test), 1 copy of the identification card, 1 copy of family civil status record, 1 recent passport sized colored photograph. All Lebanese applicants must submit their national social security papers (daman), if available, or must pay $135 and fill the appropriate papers at the social security office. There is a $30 non-refundable application fee and $20 for each Entrance exam.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are the majors offered in the School of Education for undergraduates?

The undergraduate majors offered in the School of Education are Early Childhood Education (99 credits), Teacher Education (Biology - Chemistry) (99 credits), Teaching English as a Second Language (99 credits), Teacher Education (Physics - Mathematics) (99 credits), and Translation (108 credits).
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are the admission requirements for graduate programs at LIU?

To apply to LIU for a graduate degree, you will need to prepare the following documents: Certified copy of the Lebanese Baccalaureate Degree (BACCII) or Technical Baccalaureate degree (BT3) or their equivalence (Foreign Baccalaureate), Certified copy of the university Degree, Certified copy of the university transcript, 1 copy of the identification card, 1 copy of family civil status record, 1 recent passport sized colored photograph. All Lebanese applicants must submit their national social security papers (daman), if available, or must pay $135 and fill the appropriate papers at the social security office. There is a $50 non-refundable application fee and $20 for the English Entrance exam. If you are already an LIU student, you will need to pass by the admissions office to fill out an application form and pay the $50 non-refundable application fees.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What graduate degrees are offered in the School of Education?

LIU offers the following graduate degrees in the School of Education: Master's of Education in Teaching English as a Foreign Language (39 credits), Master's of Education in Educational Management (39 credits), and Teaching Diploma in Education (24 credits).
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are the requirements for transfer students at LIU?

If you are transferring from another university to LIU, the below documents are required: Certified copy of the Lebanese Baccalaureate Degree (BACCII) or Technical Baccalaureate degree (BT3) or their equivalence (Foreign Baccalaureate), Certified copy of the university transcript + course description, 1 copy of the identification card, 1 copy of family civil status record, 1 recent passport sized colored photograph. All Lebanese applicants must submit their national social security papers (daman), if available, or must pay $135 and fill the appropriate papers at the social security office. There is a $30 non-refundable application fee and $20 for each entrance exam.

What are the graduation requirements for a Bachelor of Business Administration at LIU?

In the Bachelor of Business Administration programs, students must successfully complete a minimum of 99 credit hours, including a minimum of 24 credit hours of General Education Required courses, a minimum of 42 credit hours of Core Business Required courses (Minimum 40% of total credit hours requirements) with a minimum GPA of 2.0, and a minimum of 33 credit hours of Major Required courses (minimum 25% of total credit hours requirements) with a minimum of 2.00 in both the Major GPA and the Cumulative GPA.
You are an educational chatbot for LIU.
What are the graduation requirements for a Master's Degree of Business Administration at LIU?

In the Master's Degree of Business Administration programs, students holding a Bachelor degree in Business Administration related majors must successfully complete 39 credit hours (500 or above Business courses) as indicated below: a minimum of 21 credit hours of Core Required courses, a minimum of 12 credit hours of Major Required courses, and a minimum of 6 credit hours of Major Elective courses.

What is the mission of the School of Business at LIU?

The School of Business (SoBU) aims to provide Lebanese and International students with an affirmative and career-focused education, upholding analytical and critical thinking, ethical apprehension, and cultural conscientiousness in expected global business leaders. We are also committed to delivering teaching, research and learning opportunities of the highest quality that combine academic excellence with impact upon business and society, through curricula aligned with the latest trends in Business industries.

To provide Lebanese and International students with an affirmative and career-focused education, upholding analytical and critical thinking, ethical apprehension, and cultural conscientiousness in expected global business leaders. Also, to deliver teaching, research, and learning opportunities of the highest quality that combine academic excellence with impact upon business and society, through curricula aligned with the latest trends in Business industries.
